query: SELECT e.id, e.title, COUNT(g.id) as guest_count FROM events e LEFT JOIN guests g ON e.id = g.eventId WHERE e.title LIKE '%Louis%' OR e.title LIKE '%Ren%' GROUP BY e.id, e.title;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2PMnkMFrZnXtRMs.8c3e75715602 --database CmoCN8ea9H2wev4kGq2LWy --execute SELECT e.id, e.title, COUNT(g.id) as guest_count FROM events e LEFT JOIN guests g ON e.id = g.eventId WHERE e.title LIKE '%Louis%' OR e.title LIKE '%Ren%' GROUP BY e.id, e.title;
